thread.title: Frances Butterfoss

author: Frances Butterfoss
title: Frances Butterfoss
text: If the main reason of the course, besides certification, is to learn safe boating practices, I would include a short explanation of why a question was missed on the practice tests. I also would also let test taker review the section(s) where more than one question was missed on the Quiz rather than having to repeat the whole Chapter session again,
